name: Pixels at Solstice
description:
(click the game when loaded, then use WASD or ARROW keys to move)


'pixels at solstice' is a tiny zine game about the longest nights of the year & how we can stay connected, even in the dark. 

just go  on up through the woods until you can see the whole city.

a collaboration between dreamfeel & sarah maria griffin, made in unity & the flatgame maker, using graphics developed with the electric zine maker, on the winter solstice 2020.

Happy Solstice & Happy New Year!
- sarah & llaura
